snippet: The report released on Wednesday by state ethics regulators offered a scathing assessment not just of Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez, but also of the Assembly speaker, Sheldon Silver, and his staff.
abstract: State ethics regulators release report that offers scathing assessment of Assemblyman Vito J Lopez, Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver and Lopez's staff; report says Assembly's leadership shielded Lopez from public scrutiny amid allegations against him by his staff of sexual harassment.
lead_paragraph: The report released on Wednesday by state ethics regulators offered a scathing assessment not just of Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez, but also of the Assembly speaker, Sheldon Silver, and his staff.

headline.seo: Assembly Leaders Shielded Vito J. Lopez From Public Scrutiny
headline.main: Report Finds Lawmaker Was Shielded by Leaders
headline.print_headline: Ethics Panel Finds Lopez Was Shielded by Leaders
